content: I'm glad I could help with the bookshelf organization and plant recommendations. Now, let's get back to the mattress search. I've been thinking about my old college dorm room desk, which I finally moved to the garage last weekend. It's amazing how much space it was taking up in my home office! Anyway, I'll keep an eye out for more mattress reviews and try to read as many as I can before making a decision. Do you have any tips on how to negotiate the price of a mattress when purchasing in-store?
